bibl.title: Towards a New Social and Economic History of the Hellenistic World.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Zosia H. Archibald, John K. Davies & Vincent Gabrielsen (edd.), The Economies of Hellenistic Societies, Third to First Centuries BC (Oxford, 2011). - Voir en part. pp. 489-491: Ptolemaic Egypt (and pre-Ptolemaic Cyrenaica).
